descriptionHtml:
1.0

Retextured DragonPriest Hood. Custom Spec and Normal Maps.

Enjoy

 -Ludovico



Install:
--------

Unzip or Drop contents into Skyrim main dir.

Files Added:
------------

dragonpriesthood.dds
dragonpriesthood_n.dds

Uninstall:

Remove the above files from skyrim/data/textures/armor/dragonpriesthelm
author: Ludovico
